review.title: “Great Place to Work”
review.pros: Pros – Friendly, supportive culture . Teamwork environment. Great satisfaction in working to help people find the Right Job and Grow their career.
review.cons: Cons – Stressful when the pending placement fails and dealing with candidate or employer's disappointment
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
